excerpt: A delicious and comforting vegan soup that is perfect for cold days.

instructions.name: Soup base
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is translucent.
Add broccoli and vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 10-15 minutes, or until broccoli is soft.
Remove from heat and let cool slightly.

instructions.name: Cheese sauce
instructions: In a blender or food processor, combine soaked cashews, nutritional yeast, lemon juice, garlic powder, salt, and water.

instructions.name: Finish the soup
instructions: Working in batches, blend soup until smooth.
Return soup to pot and heat over medium heat.
Add cheese sauce and stir until well combined.
If the soup is too thick, add more vegetable broth or water to achieve the desired consistency.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
